entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:39 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 07:39 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
